unnormalised: Boru, online learning, bareabar? Tem Bharotant khub vhodd zal'lam, khas korun 2020 uprant. Soglle tech guru zaun geleat, vo atam tori zaleleachem natak kortat! Mhozo dhaktulo bhav, Rohan, to Ryan International-ant Class 7-nt asa, to Byju's-acheruch jietat mhonnlear cholta.
normalised: Boro, online learning, bareabar? Bharotant tem khubuch vaddon gela, khas korun don hazar ani visa-visanantar. Soglle tech guru zaleat ekdom, vo kamit kamit tem ashnache natak korunk lagleat! Mhozo lhan bhav, Rohan, zo Ryan Internationalant class saatant asa, to B-Y-J-U's cher jiyetalo dista.

unnormalised: Adim, tum IIT-JEE vo NEET-ak boreantli bori coaching gheunk Delhi vo Mumbai-nt astolo poddtalo. Atam, Guwahati sarkea dhakttea xarantlea lokankui Vedantu vo Unacademy vorvim boreant bori xikxonnak melltta. Tem ekdom game-changer! Ani kimot? Eka vorsache coaching-ak Rs. 50,000+-i lagtale. Atam tumchea lagim ₹20,000 vo tatuncheaikui unne kurs melta jea vellar sale cholta.
normalised: Adim, I-I-T-J-E-E vo N-E-E-T khatir bori coaching mellovonk Delhi vo Mumbai-ant sharirik ritin astoch poddttalo. Atam, lhan xaranchea lokankuy, zoxem Guwahati-chea lokankuy Vedantu vo Unacademy vorvim boreantlea bore xikxokanchem margdarxon mellonk xokta. Tem ekdom game-changer asa! Ani kimati? Eka vorsache coachingak rupiya ponchvas hazar plus ashtale. Atam, tumkam rupiya visa hazarankuy kurs mellonk xoktat, vo team-ek sale mell'lelear odhikuy komi mellonk xoktat.

unnormalised: Mhoji attem, Priya aunty-n Masai School-antle online coding bootcamp-ant aplo nao nond kelo. Ti 45 vorsanchi, ani ti Python xikta! Khorench impress korpa sarkhem. Ti mhonnta ki soglle live classes asta ani fattim record kel'le lectures nastat je tum zopta. Ti commitment sokallim 9 AM tem rati 9 PM, Som-Sat. Kitlo intense!
normalised: Mhaji kaki, Priya kaki, asli Masai School-anchea online coding bootcamp-ant nanv nondani kelam. Ti ponchallas vorsanchi asa, ani ti Python xiktasa! Khorench dhaniyavad divpache. Ti mhuntta ki soglle live classes astata ani vo pre-recorded lectures natttat je tum sohun yetana nizta. The commitment's nau A-M te nau P-M, Somvar te Xenvar. Kitli godde!

unnormalised: EdTech company-ui marketing-ant pischachem bhaxen choltat. YouTube-acher poddpo ek ad-ui online kursa vatten asta. Ani sogllim "success stories" – "Ramesh-an XYZ coaching-ank lagun aplia Class 10 board-ant 99% ghetle!" Tum taka vicharunk poddta kitlem sorem ani kitlem, marketing hype asta.
normalised: E-D-Tech company-euy marketingak lagun khubuch pishem zataleat. YouTube-acher her ek jaheer online course-ak astach. Plus, hi soglli ‘success stories’ – “Ramesh-an X-Y-Z coachingak lagun aplea class dha boardanchem ponchiannove percent score kela!” Tumkam dubao yetto ki kitlem khorem ani kitlem marketing hype asa mhunnon.

unnormalised: Eka vost ji khatren problem asa ti mhollear screen time. Bhurgim dis bhor aplea phone-ak chittkun ravtat, atam tankam ani xikxonnachea vattenco dekhun screen-acher ravonk poddta! Dr. Sharma, mhozo ghorkar doctor, sangta taka bhurgim dokidukh ani dolle dukhtat mhonn dukhi zatat. Tankam thoddem regulation zai, mhaka dista. 10 vorshanchea bhurgeank dar ratchim devices-acher tel pollounk favona, bareabar?
normalised: Ek vostu ji nischit rupant problem asa ti screen time. Pillam disbhor aplea phonancher chikttun astat, atam tankam odhikuch vell skolekhatir screenanchea samkar pasar korcho poddtta! Doctor Sharma, mhajea kutumbacho doctor, mhuntta ki tankam odhikuch pillam dok dukhta ani dolle dukhtat mhuntat. Thoddo niyamanchi goroz asa mhuntan hanv. Dha vorsanche pillam दरर रात device-ancher raatchea baarachе tel ghalunk favona, bareabar?

unnormalised: Punn hey, suvidha tor nakarunk favo na. Delhi-chea ubnent tuition class-acher vochonk poddna. Tumchea ghorant sukhashen, pijama ghalun, chai-cho kop gheun xikxon gheta. Tem boreak poddna, tumchea lagu? Ani mhojea pajari-chi bailen 2023-ant UPSC Civil Services exam pass keli online-cher chodd xikun.
normalised: Pun bhov, सुविधा nischit zavn asa. Delhi-chea unntachea disanim tution classank vochonchi garaz nasli. Tuzhea ghorachea sukhant, tuzhea pyjamant, ek cup chai gheun xikonk melltta. Tuka harovonk zaina, bareabar? Plus, mhajea neighborhood-achi choli don hazar ani visank tin UPSC Civil Services exam pass zali लगभग पूरी तरह online वाचन करून.

unnormalised: Sorpontponan, Bharotantle online learning ek mix zal'lo pishvi asa. Tem zannank melpak vaddoilem, punn tem novim addchonnio zoddlem. Ami polleonk zai ki taka amchea bhurgeam khatir sukha ani bholaiki-chem koxem korunk zata. Kaim manddunk favo zal'lim screen breaks, vo bhurgeamni devices-acher disak kitlea velak ravonk zata tachi vel marjada? Just a thought!
normalised: Oveall, Bharotantle online learning ek मिस्रोत बैग. Tenam khupuy lokank sarkhe avasar ughadde keleat, pun tenam नवीण आव्हान utpann keleat. आम्हांक कश्यपण शिकूंन घेवणुक कि कसा सतत आणि आरोग्यदायिक करून टाकूं शक्ताल आमच्या पिळयां खातीर. माती अनिवार्य स्क्रीन ब्रेक घेवून किंवा किती वेळ पिलांनी डिवाइस वर वेळ घालोवचो अशा मर्यादा लावन. फक्त एक विचार!
